description:
Berthier is the second youngest sister. Her name is French, coming from the mineral berthierite. She fears Rubeus but has no love interest for him unlike her other sisters.
Berthier has a very darkly playful personality, but is shown to have great respect for all of her siblings. Much like her counterpart in Ami, she is also a strategist and is incredibly talented at chess.
Her attack is Dark Water, which is a stream of freezing water which surrounded her and was then blasted towards the enemy.
Source: wiki
name: Berthier
